channel.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 14th of June, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Latest on deprecating basic auth for Exchange, Introduction to Microsoft Graph .Net SDK v5, and Introduction to Microsoft Graph Postman collection. Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) - June 2022 update and 8 new documents/articles released.

Three demos - Latest on deprecating basic auth for Exchange, Introduction to Microsoft Graph .Net SDK v5, and Introduction to Microsoft Graph Postman collection. Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) - June 2022 update and 8 new documents/articles released.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) - June 2022 update
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) June 2022 update is out with a summary of the latest guidance, samples, and solutions from Microsoft or from the community for the community.
Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) June 2022 update is out with a summary of the latest guidance, samples, and solutions from Microsoft or from the community for the community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 170
item.description: SharePoint developer - Marcin Wojciechowski (Valo Solutions), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss quality assurance, risk management, development tools, news sources, tips to new developers plus latest 24 articles/tweets/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.

SharePoint developer - Marcin Wojciechowski (Valo Solutions), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss quality assurance, risk management, development tools, news sources, tips to new developers plus latest 24 articles/tweets/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Office Add-ins community call – June 8, 2022
item.description: Microsoft roadmap for One Outlook, Outlook Smart Alerts (Demo), Using Blazor in an Excel add-in. Q&A in chat and at end of call.
Microsoft roadmap for One Outlook, Outlook Smart Alerts (Demo), Using Blazor in an Excel add-in. Q&A in chat and at end of call.
item.dc:creator: Sam Ramon

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 9th of June, 2022
item.description: Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Sessionize Demo, List Formatting - Payment Registration, and Understanding Sites.Selected permissions in SharePoint Online. Yo teams version preview releases, 5 Independent Publisher Connectors, 9 scripts and 1Teams sample. Power Platform Samples Contributor training announced.

Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Sessionize Demo, List Formatting - Payment Registration, and Understanding Sites.Selected permissions in SharePoint Online. Yo teams version preview releases, 5 Independent Publisher Connectors, 9 scripts and 1Teams sample. Power Platform Samples Contributor training announced.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Quick overview of Microsoft Power Pages
item.description: Quick Overview of Microsoft Power Pages Hi there,in this article, I will be introducing you to the new member of the new Microsoft Power Platform Family - Power Pages.
Quick Overview of Microsoft Power Pages Hi there,in this article, I will be introducing you to the new member of the new Microsoft Power Platform Family - Power Pages.
item.dc:creator: Favour Adekunle

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 7th of June, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Migrate your SharePoint workflows to Power Automate with migration tooling (preview), TeamsJS SDK V2 to extend your Microsoft Teams solutions to Outlook and Office, and Send a SMS message with Azure Communication Services. New articles, updated samples.

Three demos - Migrate your SharePoint workflows to Power Automate with migration tooling (preview), TeamsJS SDK V2 to extend your Microsoft Teams solutions to Outlook and Office, and Send a SMS message with Azure Communication Services. New articles, updated samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Understanding Data Connectors with Microsoft Power Apps
item.description: In today’s article, I will be looking at working with Data Connectors while building with Microsoft Power Apps.
In today’s article, I will be looking at working with Data Connectors while building with Microsoft Power Apps.

item.title: Getting started with unit testing SPFx
item.description: Introduction and base concepts Contrary to popular belief I don’t think unit testing is easy.
Introduction and base concepts Contrary to popular belief I don’t think unit testing is easy.
item.dc:creator: Marcin Wojciechowski

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 169
item.description: Microsoft 365 Solution Architect - Yannick Reekmans (Qubix), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss how customers, partners and IT can approach Power Platform, staying current, building business, Microsoft support, plus latest 14 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.

Microsoft 365 Solution Architect - Yannick Reekmans (Qubix), joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss how customers, partners and IT can approach Power Platform, staying current, building business, Microsoft support, plus latest 14 articles/videos from Microsoft/Community this week.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 2nd of June, 2022
item.description: Demos: Building FAQs web part with Property Field Collection Data, Solve Teams and SharePoint Theme problems with the ‘Enhanced Theme Provider’ control, and Building custom list form components with SPFx v1.15. Released SPFx v1.15 (RC), 6 web part, 4 ACE samples.

Demos: Building FAQs web part with Property Field Collection Data, Solve Teams and SharePoint Theme problems with the ‘Enhanced Theme Provider’ control, and Building custom list form components with SPFx v1.15. Released SPFx v1.15 (RC), 6 web part, 4 ACE samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 31st of May, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Latest on the Microsoft Graph developer portal updates and Microsoft Build 2022 - key announcements for Microsoft 365 platform. Highlighted 19 Microsoft 365 Platform related articles supporting announcements at Build.

Two demos - Latest on the Microsoft Graph developer portal updates and Microsoft Build 2022 - key announcements for Microsoft 365 platform. Highlighted 19 Microsoft 365 Platform related articles supporting announcements at Build.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Build your own Microsoft Teams using Microsoft Graph Toolkit and .NET Core API and Integrate using Web Components
item.description: Business Case Teams chat is a great communication tool that is adopted worldwide.
Business Case Teams chat is a great communication tool that is adopted worldwide.
item.dc:creator: Sohil Bhalla

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.3
item.description: We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.
We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.
item.dc:creator: Patrick Lamber

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 168
item.description: Microsoft Graph team PM Sébastien Levert, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss delivering great customer experiences, importance of data in product development decisionmaking, tips to prospective Product Managers, and latest articles/videos (many Build related) from Microsoft and Community.

Microsoft Graph team PM Sébastien Levert, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss delivering great customer experiences, importance of data in product development decisionmaking, tips to prospective Product Managers, and latest articles/videos (many Build related) from Microsoft and Community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 26th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Case - Netherland Railroads, Data Loss Prevention (DLP) solution for emails with Microsoft Graph, and TeamsFx .NET - Use SQLite and generic forms for your next Teams Dev demo. Released MGT v2.5.2, 3 script samples.

Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Case - Netherland Railroads, Data Loss Prevention (DLP) solution for emails with Microsoft Graph, and TeamsFx .NET - Use SQLite and generic forms for your next Teams Dev demo. Released MGT v2.5.2, 3 script samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 167
item.description: Valo Solutions’ developer, PnP PowerShell maintainer and MVP Gautam Sheth, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss how employers may look at open-source, keeping up with product changes and what’s next for PowerShell? Latest articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.

Valo Solutions’ developer, PnP PowerShell maintainer and MVP Gautam Sheth, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss how employers may look at open-source, keeping up with product changes and what’s next for PowerShell? Latest articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 24th of May, 2022
item.description: The format and recording for today’s call was altered due to Microsoft Build 2022. In the recorded 15 minutes, Microsoft’s Viva Connections ISV benefits program was outlined after which the community separately viewed Satya Nadella’s Build keynote and shared thoughts in chat.

The format and recording for today’s call was altered due to Microsoft Build 2022. In the recorded 15 minutes, Microsoft’s Viva Connections ISV benefits program was outlined after which the community separately viewed Satya Nadella’s Build keynote and shared thoughts in chat.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Power App for Time Sheeting
item.description: Community Sample Timesheet App This blog explains how I created a time sheet app in Power Apps.
Community Sample Timesheet App This blog explains how I created a time sheet app in Power Apps.
item.dc:creator: Darren Lutchner

item.title: How to use the Power Platform developer plan with the Microsoft 365 Developer program
item.description: What is Microsoft 365 Developer Account? The Microsoft 365 Developer Program includes a Microsoft 365 E5 developer subscription that you can use to create your own sandbox and develop solutions independent of your production environment.

What is Microsoft 365 Developer Account? The Microsoft 365 Developer Program includes a Microsoft 365 E5 developer subscription that you can use to create your own sandbox and develop solutions independent of your production environment.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Irabor

item.title: Microsoft Identity Platform community call – May 2022
item.description: Microsoft Graph’s advanced capabilities for querying directory objects – learn how to unlock the full potential of our Directory Object APIs using the Advanced Query Capabilities, allowing developers to Count, Filter, Search and Sort Directory Objects on more properties with more OData operators.

Microsoft Graph’s advanced capabilities for querying directory objects – learn how to unlock the full potential of our Directory Object APIs using the Advanced Query Capabilities, allowing developers to Count, Filter, Search and Sort Directory Objects on more properties with more OData operators.
item.dc:creator: Nandeesh Swami

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – May 2022
item.description: Demos: Automatically generate technical documentation of your Power Apps and Power Automate Flows, Streamline Annual Document Reviews with Power Apps, and Power Platform and Microsoft Teams- Create a ‘back-channel’​ internal chat for any meeting. Articles and trainings reviewed.

Demos: Automatically generate technical documentation of your Power Apps and Power Automate Flows, Streamline Annual Document Reviews with Power Apps, and Power Platform and Microsoft Teams- Create a ‘back-channel’​ internal chat for any meeting. Articles and trainings reviewed.
item.dc:creator: David Warner II

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 19th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos: Building Office Locations Viva Connections Adaptive Card Extension with SPF, and Using Adaptive Cards Designer control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions. Released PnPjs Client-Side Libraries v3.3.2 GA and CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.3.0 beta.

Demos: Building Office Locations Viva Connections Adaptive Card Extension with SPF, and Using Adaptive Cards Designer control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions. Released PnPjs Client-Side Libraries v3.3.2 GA and CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.3.0 beta.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Adaptive Cards community call – May 2022
item.description: Featured demo - Handling multi-user responses for Adaptive Cards in Teams – posting a card with Power Automate in a Teams meeting chat. The card can handle multiple responses and adds tasks to Planner. Q&A deep dive aligned to demo.

Featured demo - Handling multi-user responses for Adaptive Cards in Teams – posting a card with Power Automate in a Teams meeting chat. The card can handle multiple responses and adds tasks to Planner. Q&A deep dive aligned to demo.
item.dc:creator: J.P. Roca

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 166
item.description: Microsoft Principal PM Lead, DevDiv - Pierce Boggan, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss career journey, people management, optimizing developer experiences, creating apps with Teams Toolkit, 3 new Teams Toolkit features, plus articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.

Microsoft Principal PM Lead, DevDiv - Pierce Boggan, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss career journey, people management, optimizing developer experiences, creating apps with Teams Toolkit, 3 new Teams Toolkit features, plus articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
